posts.post_content: i have a question i have 2 coppies of karn in my deck i play one and i want to get close to his ultimate im running artifacts and so is my opponent karns +3 ability says target player exiles a card from his/her hand. can i use this if my opponent does not have any cards in his hand? i know house rules says whatever i want but official rules say?... again artifact deck that he plays many spells at a time so he has run out of a hand on my turn... does karn still get +3? and yes i know i could allways target myself... if anyone could please email me the official ruling for such an ability id greatly apreciate it himheadforlife@yahoo.com

posts.post_content: There's something else that most people seem to be forgetting- that his +4 is **+4**. That, in addition to the fact that he starts with 6 loyalty, makes him the hardest planeswalker to deal with. Even tougher than [Nicol Bolas](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nicol Bolas), and playable in any color deck. I wouldn't say broken, but he's pretty close.

posts.post_content: I'm running a battle cry deck with Koth, and although it might not be the first choice, I can see Karn working well there. Use Koth to get the mana required for Karn, exile a number of battle cry guys from your hand, then use the -14 to start over, using the battle cry guys to do upwards of 10 damage on turn 1 of the new game.

posts.post_content:
How to cast ALL DA SPELLZ; a "fun" combo from my EDH deck!  
  
Exile the following:  
  
[Jace, Architect of Thought](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace, Architect of Thought)  
[Tamiyo, the Moon Sage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tamiyo, the Moon Sage)  
[Viral Drake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Viral Drake)  
[Filigree Sages](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Filigree Sages)  
[Training Grounds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Training Grounds)  
[Gilded Lotus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gilded Lotus)  
  
Then restart the game; proceed to create infinite mana with the sages, training grounds and lotus. Then proliferate your planeswalkers up to 8. Use Tamiyo's ultimate, then use Jace's ultimate. Thanks to the Tamiyo emblem add Jace back to your hand, cast him again, proliferate up to 8, ult again. Rinse and repeat.  
  
Proceed to cast every spell in your deck and your opponents' decks.   
  
Not good enough for you? Cast [Temporal Cascade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Temporal Cascade) from your hand or deck if you'd like the contents of their hands as well.
posts.html:
How to cast ALL DA SPELLZ; a "fun" combo from my EDH deck!

Exile the following:

Jace, Architect of Thought
Tamiyo, the Moon Sage
Viral Drake
Filigree Sages
Training Grounds
Gilded Lotus

Then restart the game; proceed to create infinite mana with the sages, training grounds and lotus. Then proliferate your planeswalkers up to 8. Use Tamiyo's ultimate, then use Jace's ultimate. Thanks to the Tamiyo emblem add Jace back to your hand, cast him again, proliferate up to 8, ult again. Rinse and repeat.

Proceed to cast every spell in your deck and your opponents' decks.

Not good enough for you? Cast Temporal Cascade from your hand or deck if you'd like the contents of their hands as well.
